channel.title: SQL on Himanshu Shah
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on Himanshu Shah

item.title: Viant Technology - Full Stack Intern
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Full Stack Intern in the Platform team I - Developed a video-to-audio conversion microservice to enhance ad campaign performance using creatives in not only video but also audio ad placements, achieving an estimated `15%` lift in revenue. Used `AWS Lambda`, `MediaConvert`, `SNS`, and `DynamoDB`. Teamed up with another intern to automate the process of adding new third-party user segments using `Angular`, `Golang`, `AWS APIGateway`, and `S3`, saving `8+` engineer hours per use.

item.title: Visible Alpha - SE 1
item.description: Responsibilities/Accomplishments As a Software Engineer in the Data feed and APIs team, I - Migrated the existing monolithic ETL application to microservices, delivering high-volume, real-time data with low latency to clients, using `Django`, `MongoDB`, and `Redis`, driving `$2 million` in revenue. Reduced the ETL app file dispatch latency by `~80%` using `RabbitMQ` and `Celery` for async task execution (60 to 10 seconds). Added `REST APIs` and `AWS S3` as data delivery channels to ease data consumption for customers.
